name: Garden Buddies
description:
Step into the world of Garden Buddies and unleash your inner gardener. Cultivate a vibrant garden with adorable companion Mutsy, finding joy and peace. Nurture your virtual garden, overcome challenges, and celebrate achievements together. Garden Buddies invites you to a tranquil oasis, where creating brings calm and balance.



Simple and Fun

Simplicity reigns supreme in Garden Buddies, offering a chance to unwind and immerse yourself in soothing gameplay. The game's intuitive mechanics and user-friendly interface effortlessly guide your journey, encouraging relaxation and focusing on the captivating experience that awaits.


Friendship Is Key

Companionship takes center stage as you embark on delightful encounters with adorable animals and extraordinary plant creatures every day. By forming a bond with these charming critters, you'll help them overcome hurdles through engaging and delightful mini-games. These challenges entertain and bring a sense of accomplishment and camaraderie.


Heal Your Mind

Garden Buddies goes beyond the joy of gardening and mini-games, providing a healing experience for your mind and soul. Step away from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, take a deep breath, and let the game guide you toward inner peace.


Explore

Explore essential life skills like box breathing and grounding techniques, while delving into emotions and engaging in discussions that promote emotional well-being. Garden Buddies becomes your virtual oasis, offering a safe haven to reduce stress and anxiety, all while immersing yourself in the beauty of digital nature.


Escape to Tranquility

Get ready to escape to a world where tranquility and companionship flourish. Let Garden Buddies be your guides as you cultivate not only a breathtaking flower garden but also a renewed sense of calm and balance in your life. Uncover the therapeutic power of gardening and embark on a journey of self-discovery and joy. Are you ready to find solace in the embrace of Garden Buddies? Your peaceful sanctuary awaits.


Features:
  • 90-minute story mode filled with enchanting narratives, heartwarming interactions, and unexpected twists.
  • Multiple Game Modes
  • A Soothing soundtrack made for relaxation and harmony
  • A healing experience for the mind, introducing essential life skills such as mindfulness exercises, stress reduction techniques, and emotional well-being practices
  • Charming characters and animal companions
  • Multiple customization options– unlock an array of decorative items and accessories for your oasis of peace and quiet.
